value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 26: December 2021 Update
value.excerpt: In this video, Peter Myers (Microsoft Most Valued Professional - Data Platform, and course developer) describes and demonstrates new capabilities and features added to #Microsoft #PowerBI paginated reports since the last update for December 2020 was recorded. value.title: Austin Power BI User Group - Charticulator 101
value.excerpt: This Austin User Group presentation is all about the Basics of Charticulator. We also go through three demos of visual creations. 1. Build a fancy Bar chart mirroring what is done in desktop 2. Cool chart with stacked bars and scatter plot 3. Box and Whisker chart  Follow Mike on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelcarlo/

value.excerpt: Age banding is a common scenario in analytics, and I have explained how it is possible in many different ways. value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Aggregation to speed up the performance of a Power BI report even if all IMPORTED

This video is about this question and shows how you can speed up your model

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful

value.excerpt: One of the performance considerations of a Power BI file is to reduce the size of it as much as possible. value.title: Power BI Design Tip   Design for Mobile Device
value.excerpt: Power BI is a mobile-friendly reporting solution. Every report that you generate can be viewed on the Mobile too.
